content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's focus on the price negotiation: As this is a highly sought-after, brand new apartment in a prime location, I was initially thinking of 1500 Euros a month. However, considering our brief conversation, I may be willing to lower it a little, Max. How about 1450 Euros? If this still doesn't meet your expectations, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm adamant on a considerable return on my investment. If, however, you find this a reasonable compromise, 'I agree to the price of 1450 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I think 1450 Euro is a bit steep for an unfurnished apartment. I'm a dependable tenant and I always pay my rent on time. I think a more fair price would be 1300 Euro.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As landlord Peter Schmidt, I'm finding it difficult to lower the rent much further, as I've already made a concession. However, with the assurance of a reliable tenant such as yourself, and to avoid a prolonged negotiation, 'I agree to the price of 1350 Euro!' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
